name: Cicin's Cold Glare
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage, equip this card.
After Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage equips this card, immediately use Misty Summons once.
After your Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage, who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: If Cryo Cicins' Usage(s) have exceeded their upper limit, deal 2 Cryo DMG.
(You must have Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2101]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A2101] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S21012]</color> once.
After your $[A2101], who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: If <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C121011]</color>' $[K3] have exceeded their upper limit, deal 2 $[K101].
(You must have $[A2101] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage</color>, equip this card.
After Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Misty Summons</color> once.
After your Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage, who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: If <color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Cicins</color>' <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color> have exceeded their upper limit, deal 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>.
(You must have Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytitle: Cryo Cicin Mage: Cicin's Cold Glare
storytext:
More Mist Grass means more friendly Cryo Cicins.
...But what happens when the Mist Grass is used up?
Perhaps she never considered this.
source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Cryo Cicin Mage at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas
